triples.name: Autonomous agent
triples.relevance: The paper surveys autonomous agents as the core topic, examining how LLMs enable their development and deployment.

triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs are the central technology that the paper focuses on for building autonomous agents.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Machine learning is the foundational technique underlying LLM training and agent development.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP is the primary task that LLMs perform, enabling agents to understand and generate human language.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Reinforcement learning is a key training method used to develop autonomous agents with LLMs.
